languages.text: "Точно? А я как раз собирался завершить рассказ краткой сагой на четыреста строф о дарах Рунного волка Лаккана".
"Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."
languages.original_text: "Точно? А я как раз собирался завершить рассказ краткой сагой на четыреста строф о дарах Рунного волка Лаккана".

traits.locale_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."
"Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."
"Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."
"Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

languages.text: “你已经明白了吗？我正打算用简短的四百行史诗，稍微介绍一下咒狼拉坎赐予我们的礼物呢。”
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: “你已经明白了吗？我正打算用简短的四百行史诗，稍微介绍一下咒狼拉坎赐予我们的礼物呢。”

languages.text: «¿Ah, sí? Vaya, y yo que pensaba terminar la historia con una breve saga de cuatrocientas estrofas sobre los regalos de Lakkan, el Lobo Rúnico».
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: «¿Ah, sí? Vaya, y yo que pensaba terminar la historia con una breve saga de cuatrocientas estrofas sobre los regalos de Lakkan, el Lobo Rúnico».

languages.text: 「そうか？これから、ルーンの狼ラッカンの贈り物についての400節の短いサーガで話を締めくくるところだったんだが」
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: 「そうか？これから、ルーンの狼ラッカンの贈り物についての400節の短いサーガで話を締めくくるところだったんだが」

languages.text: "Tatsächlich? Und ich wollte meine Geschichte mit einer vierhundert Verse kurzen Saga über die Gaben von Lakkan dem Runenwolf abschließen."
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich? Und ich wollte meine Geschichte mit einer vierhundert Verse kurzen Saga über die Gaben von Lakkan dem Runenwolf abschließen."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Et moi qui pensais devoir argumenter avec une saga de quatre cents vers sur les dons octroyés par Lakkan, le Loup Runique. »
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Et moi qui pensais devoir argumenter avec une saga de quatre cents vers sur les dons octroyés par Lakkan, le Loup Runique. »

languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

languages.text: "Anladın mı? Ben de tam Rün Kurdu Lakkan'ın armağanları hakkında dört yüz dizelik bir destanla hikâyemi taçlandıracaktım."
languages.original_text: "Do you? And there I was about to round off my story with a short four-hundred verse saga about the gifts of Lakkan the Runed Wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Anladın mı? Ben de tam Rün Kurdu Lakkan'ın armağanları hakkında dört yüz dizelik bir destanla hikâyemi taçlandıracaktım."
